casebody.data:
No. 4,

Original.

New York v. Illinois et al. Louis J. Lefkowitz, Attorney General of New York, Paxton Blair, Solicitor General, Richard H. Shepp, Assistant Attorney General, and Randall J. Le Boeuj, Jr., Special Assistant Attorney General, for complainant. Grenville Beardsley, Attorney General of Illinois, William C. Wines, Assistant Attorney General, Lawrence J. Fenlon, Peter G. Kuh, George A. Lane, Joseph B. Fleming, Joseph H. Pleck and Thomas M. Thomas for defendants.

The report of the Special Master is received and ordered filed. The motion of the complainant for leave to file a supplemental and amended complaint is granted and the defendants are allowed 45 days within which to file answers thereto.
